SEARCH
Package repository

Class PatientRepository

Object
PatientRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
Repository<Patient,String>
public class PatientRepository extends Object implements Repository<Patient,String>
The PatientRepository class is responsible for managing a collection of patient records. It allows for adding, retrieving, deleting, and querying patients by their unique identifier (hospital ID). This class provides a singleton pattern for global access and implements the Repository interface.

  • Constructor Details

    • PatientRepository

      private PatientRepository()
      Private constructor to initialize the patient repository. Uses a ConcurrentHashMap to store patient records.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static PatientRepository getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the PatientRepository. If the instance does not exist, it will be created.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of PatientRepository.

    • save

      public Patient save(Patient patient)
      Saves a Patient in the repository. If a patient with the same hospital ID already exists, it will be overwritten.
      Specified by:
      save in interface Repository<Patient,String>
      Parameters:
      patient - The Patient to save.
      Returns:
      The saved Patient.

    • findById

      public Optional<Patient> findById(String id)
      Finds a Patient by their hospital ID.
      Specified by:
      findById in interface Repository<Patient,String>
      Parameters:
      id - The hospital ID of the patient to find.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the Patient if found, or an empty Optional if not.

    • findAll

      public List<Patient> findAll()
      Retrieves all Patient entries from the repository.
      Specified by:
      findAll in interface Repository<Patient,String>
      Returns:
      A list of all Patient records.

    • delete

      public void delete(String id)
      Deletes a Patient by their hospital ID.
      Specified by:
      delete in interface Repository<Patient,String>
      Parameters:
      id - The hospital ID of the patient to delete.

    • exists

      public boolean exists(String id)
      Checks if a Patient with the specified hospital ID exists in the repository.
      Specified by:
      exists in interface Repository<Patient,String>
      Parameters:
      id - The hospital ID of the patient to check for existence.
      Returns:
      true if the Patient exists, false otherwise.

    • clearAll

      public void clearAll()
      Clears all Patient records from the repository.
      Specified by:
      clearAll in interface Repository<Patient,String>
